comments: She goes over what\'s going to be on the homework in class and basically shows you how to do it. There is a lot of homework and you will fail if you don\'t do it. She allows for it to be worth half credit when turned in late. Midterm and final are multiple choice. Quizzes are step by step instructions given on how to do something on the computer.

Lauren is a wonderful teacher. She wants you to understand & does everything she can to help you. Show up to class, do your homework & an A or B is yours! However, not a good class if you use a MAC computer! Word for MAC is NOT the same!
Very good teacher, very helpful, she wants you to learn something after you\'re done. I recommend her with all my hart.

Ms. LoPresti sincerely wants every person who enters her class to succeed. She will go beyond what is expected to help each and every student. There is a lot of work, but if you stay on schedule, you won\'t have any problems.

Great Teacher!! Always willing to help. Very easy class especially when you know about Microsoft Word, Excel, Etc. But if you don\'t, she is very useful and makes everything easy for you. Genuinely cares about her students and makes sure they are going in the right direction.
